content: **crocheted round bag in drops bomull-lin ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern l-170 yarn group c ------------------------------------------------------- **size** approx 20 cm in diameter **yarn** drops bomull-lin from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 150 g colour 03 sand **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 4 5 mm **crochet gauge** 16 treble crochets in width and 9 row in height = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size -----------------------------------------------
